example_guideline.description: Standard guideline for Indian market leisure groups based on the Italy group example

basic_information.agent_note: Applies to all Indian market agents unless agent-specific guideline exists
basic_information.description: Standard guideline for Indian market leisure groups. Emphasis on Indian cuisine, guided tours, and value pricing.

accommodation.star_rating_note: Mix of 3-star and 4-star hotels. Prioritize cost-effectiveness while maintaining comfort.
accommodation.city_center_note: Flexible on location. Near event venues or exhibitions prioritized. City center secondary. Outskirts acceptable if good value.
accommodation.hotel_brand_strategy_note: Mix of chain hotels (Novotel, Mercure) and good local hotels. Cost-optimized without sacrificing quality.

meals_restaurants.meal_plan_note: Breakfast + Dinner standard. Lunch typically on own or packed meal if time-constrained.
meals_restaurants.cuisine_type_note: Indian market groups expect Indian restaurants for all dinners. Non-negotiable.
meals_restaurants.indian_meal_template: 1 non-veg curry, 2 veg curries, rice, dal, naan, poppadam, pickle, yogurt, salad, 1 dessert
meals_restaurants.indian_meal_template_note: Standard menu communicated in quotation. Can adjust portions for group size.
meals_restaurants.dietary_requirements_note: Must accommodate vegetarian options. No beef. Halal if requested.
meals_restaurants.meal_style_note: Buffet preferred for groups. Set menu acceptable if buffet unavailable.
meals_restaurants.restaurant_type_preference_note: Family-style Indian restaurants. Clean, comfortable, group-friendly.
meals_restaurants.packed_meal_rules: Packed meals (vegetarian only) provided in case of time constraints or delays

transport_transfers.group_coach_category_note: Standard coach with AC. Premium features (WiFi, restroom) not necessary unless luxury group.
transport_transfers.group_max_driving_hours_note: EU regulation: max 11 hours driving between 08:00-20:00. Strict compliance.
transport_transfers.group_driving_time_window_note: EU standard driving window. Driver must rest outside these hours.
transport_transfers.group_driver_tips_note: 2 EUR per person per day. Mandatory. Communicated to customers in quotation.

activities_tours.group_activity_type_note: Indian groups prefer cultural sightseeing: museums, historical sites, city tours, photo opportunities.
activities_tours.group_guide_requirements_note: Half-day local guides in major cities (2-3 hours). Venice, Florence, Rome, etc. Full-day guides not necessary.
activities_tours.activity_intensity_note: 3 activities per day maximum. Balance sightseeing with travel time and meals.
activities_tours.free_time_note: Evenings free for own exploration or rest. Some free time during day for shopping.

commercial_parameters.margin_note: Indian market standard margin 10-15%. 12% is balanced.
commercial_parameters.pricing_currency_note: Quote in EUR. Indian agents handle INR conversion.
commercial_parameters.offer_format_note: Groups prefer package pricing - single per-person price. Simpler for agents to sell.
commercial_parameters.foc_brackets_note: Standard: 1 FOC single from 15 paying pax. Tour leader/manager travels free.

business_logic_notes.cost_consciousness: Indian market is price-sensitive. Balance quality and cost. Value for money is key.
business_logic_notes.group_dynamics: Groups are cohesive. Need dedicated coach, set meal times, structured itinerary. Less flexibility than FIT.
business_logic_notes.communication_style: Clear, detailed pricing. Slab pricing with FOC brackets clearly communicated. Itemized breakdown not necessary.
business_logic_notes.cuisine_importance: Indian food is non-negotiable. Restaurant quality directly affects customer satisfaction.
business_logic_notes.lead_requirements_priority: If lead specifies different requirements (luxury hotels, more activities, etc.), those override guideline defaults.

preferred_hotel_brands.note: Check agent-specific preferred brands. May have relationships with specific hotel chains.

blacklisted_hotels.note: Never select blacklisted properties. May be due to past issues or customer complaints.

typical_destinations.note: Indian groups typically visit: Italy, France, Switzerland, Spain, UK, Netherlands, Belgium, Germany. Multi-country European circuits common. 7-10 day itineraries typical.

priority_hierarchy: 1. Lead parsing data (highest priority) - customer explicit requirements
ai_instructions.conflict_resolution: If lead specifies requirements that differ from guideline (e.g., 5-star hotels instead of 3-4 star), use lead requirements. Customer needs always win.
ai_instructions.quote_generation_style: Package pricing format. Clear per-person price with slab breakdown. Include all services in one price. FOC clearly stated. Indian restaurant menu template included. Driver tips mentioned separately.
